name: 2nd World Agriculture and Climate Change Conference
content: We are privileged to solicit you to present the keynote speech at 2nd World Agriculture and Climate Change Conference which is scheduled during June 17-18, 2019 in Osaka, Japan to share your research and insights upon functional analysis. The conference is based on the theme: “Agriculture in a Changing Environment”. Agri-2019 is the premier forum for professors, researchers, members from the renowned society and young researchers from academia and industry to explore their shared interest in the field of science and technology. We solicit workshops, doctoral colloquium and poster submission. Agri-2019 also announces “Young Scientist Award” and “Best Poster Award” for students. Kindly share this opportunity among your students as it is a great resume builder opportunities for them. They will get global recognition further enhancing their carrier growth. Furthermore, Agri- 2019takes pleasure in announcing “Best Research Paper Award” For the relevant details regarding sessions and tracks, feel free to visit the link provided: https://www.meetingsint.com/agri-aqua-conferences/agriculture
